title: LEON
paragraph: An application to make studying and teaching easier at home during the pandemic. It has functionality for teachers and students to communicate in live video class, share tasks, keep track of live schedules and more useful features.
paragraph2: We developed this project with a team where my role was a full-stack developer working with React.js and Java.

title: Spots.lt
paragraph: A platform to share the best spots to work in town, whether it is a cafe or a co-working space.
paragraph2: Designed with Adobe Xd and developed using plain JS and Sass, also integrated Google Maps API. The content is managed with WordPress.

title: Dviese po Azija travel blog
paragraph: A travel blog we have written and documented together with my wife while traveling across Asia.
paragraph2: This project was one of my first introductions to web-development. I have used a simple WordPress template, but edited the styling of some elements later and integrated different plugins.
